casebody.data:
No. 10-10012. Adrian Marion Smith, Petitioner v. City of Aiken, South Carolina, Public Works, et al. 564 U.S. 1023, 131 S. Ct. 3028,

180 L. Ed. 2d 852,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4745. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 409 Fed. Appx. 665.
